segments.text: I'm looking for some black pumps to go with my evening gown . Could you show me what you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , we have several different styles you may choose . How high of a heel do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not to high , maybe an inch or an inch in the half would be the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , I might have just the pair for you . Look at these , they were made in Italy , the leather is very soft , so your toes will not get pinched . You can tell just by looking at it that it was superbly made .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Those are beautiful . Do you have any in a size six ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we do , we also have this same style in dark blue and red .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you . I'm just looking for a black pair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me go to the back and get them . I'll be right back .
segments.speaker: S2
